column4: Hi, I'm a longtime Ubuntu user.  My workstation has 4 monitors (2 graphics cards), and when one of them blew out, I upgraded to dual NVidia 9550GT (I had dual NVidia 7300 before).  Now I can't use anything but the VESA driver - hrelp?

I've already tried installing the restricted drivers, and using Envy, and building kernel modules with the newest NVidia driver.  I tried both the latest Ubuntu driver (180) and the legacy (173).  Nothing works
anything similar showing up in the forums?
the solutions I've found in the forums all point to "Envy", I've tried it and it doesn't seem to help.
